name: Wilfred's Sigil of Superior Summoning
description:
Every Soul Shard you spend reduces the cooldown of 

<spec>Affliction</spec>
<dynamic>Summon Darkglare</dynamic>

<spec>Demonology</spec>
<dynamic>Summon Demonic Tyrant</dynamic>

<spec>Destruction</spec>
<dynamic>Summon Infernal</dynamic>

 by 

<spec>Affliction</spec>
<dynamic>1.0</dynamic>

<spec>Demonology</spec>
<dynamic>0.3</dynamic>

<spec>Destruction</spec>
<dynamic>2.0</dynamic>

 sec.

name: Claw of Endereth
description: Drain Life now deals damage and restores health 50% faster.

name: Mark of Borrowed Power
description:
<spec>Affliction</spec>
<dynamic>Malefic Rapture</dynamic>

<spec>Demonology</spec>
<dynamic>Call Dreadstalkers</dynamic>

<spec>Destruction</spec>
<dynamic>Chaos Bolt</dynamic>

 has a 

<spec>Affliction</spec>
<dynamic>10</dynamic>

<spec>Demonology</spec>
<dynamic>25</dynamic>

<spec>Destruction</spec>
<dynamic>5</dynamic>

% chance to refund all Soul Shards spent.

name: Pillars of the Dark Portal
description: Demonic Gateway is now instant cast, and your first use of the gateway does not trigger its cooldown.

name: Perpetual Agony of Azj'Aqir
description: Agony has a 20% increased chance to generate a Soul Shard.

name: Sacrolash's Dark Strike
description: Corruption damage is increased by 15%, and any target affected by your Corruption also has their movement speed slowed by 15%.

name: Malefic Wrath
description:
Malefic Rapture increases the damage of your 

<condition>Drain Soul</condition>
<dynamic>Drain Soul</dynamic>

Shadow Bolt by 25% for 8 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

name: Wrath of Consumption
description: Targets with die with your Agony applied to them grant you Wrath of Consumption, increasing all periodic damage dealt by 5% for 20 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

name: Implosive Pontential
description: When Implosion damages at least 3 targets, gain 5% Haste for 8 sec for each Imp exploded.

name: Grim Inquisitor's Dread Calling
description: Each Soul Shard spent on Hand of Gul'dan increases the damage of your next Call Dreadstalkers by 3%.

name: Forces of the Horned Nightmare
description: Hand of Gul'dan has a 15% chance to cast a second time on your target for free.

name: Balespider's Burning Core
description: Shadow Bolt increases the damage of your next Demonbolt by 25%, stacking up to 4 times.

name: Odr, Shawl of the Ymirjar
description: Enemies marked by your Havoc take 15% increased damage from your single target spells.

name: Cinders of the Azj'Aqir
description: Conflagrate has 1 additional charge and has its recharge time reduced by 3.0 sec.

name: Madness of the Azj'Aqir
description: Chaos Bolt increases the damage of Chaos Bolt by 10% and reduces the cast time of Chaos Bolt by 10% for 3 sec.

name: Embers of the Diabolic Raiment
description: Incinerate now generates 100% additional Soul Shard Fragments.
